SEARCH
Module org.example.scdpro2
Package org.example.scdpro2.business.services

Class ProjectService

java.lang.Object
org.example.scdpro2.business.services.ProjectService
public class ProjectService extends Object
The ProjectService class manages the creation and retrieval of Project objects. It acts as an intermediary between the business logic and data access layers, ensuring proper handling of project operations.
